<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk update authentication source"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/users/bulk/authentication-source"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Migrates all users within a site from one authentication source to another. This is a site-wide bulk operation that changes authentication configuration for all users matching the `StartingSource` to use the `TargetSource` instead.

**Prerequisites**
1. **SiteId** - The site identifier where the migration will occur. Use [GET /api/v1.0/sites](#/Sites/listSites) to find site IDs.
2. **StartingSource** / **TargetSource** - Valid authentication source names configured for your organization (e.g., 'Local', 'SAML', 'Azure AD', 'Google').

**Workflow Example**
1. Identify the site: [GET /api/v1.0/sites](#/Sites/listSites) â†’ extract `SiteId`.
2. Submit this endpoint with `SiteId`, `StartingSource`, and `TargetSource`.
3. Review the returned list of migrated user IDs.
4. Validate via [POST /api/v1.0/users](/docs/api/users/search-users) filtered by authentication source.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `SiteId`, `StartingSource`, `TargetSource`

**Notes**: This operation affects ALL users in the site who are currently using `StartingSource`. Use with caution in production environments.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request to bulk update authentication sources for users matching a source type. Mirrors `Spark.Shared.Models.Requests.BulkUpdateAuthenticationSourceRequest`. Migrates all users from `StartingSource` to `TargetSource` within the specified site.","properties":{"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site identifier where the bulk migration will occur."},"StartingSource":{"type":"string","description":"The current authentication source to migrate users from (e.g., 'Local', 'SAML', 'Azure AD')."},"TargetSource":{"type":"string","description":"The target authentication source to migrate users to (e.g., 'Local', 'SAML', 'Azure AD')."}},"title":"BulkUpdateAuthenticationSourceRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
